languages.text: "Глупец жаждет вечного служения? Но не слышит, как Неумирающий тихо смеется над его словами. Твоя судьба не служить Ему вечно. А уйти без спора, когда Он прошепчет "пора".

traits.locale_text: [draft] "Ты жаждешь вечности, но пойдешь ли на смерть во имя Неумирающего?" {n}Священник открывает рот...{/n} "Не отвечай, не множь пустословие". {n}...И тотчас захлопывает его, повинуясь магнетическому взгляду культистки.{/n}
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: "This fool says he yearns for everlasting service? He does not hear the Undying One laughing quietly at his words. It is not this man's destiny to serve Him for eternity. It is to leave meekly when He whispers, 'It is time.'"
languages.original_text: "Глупец жаждет вечного служения? Но не слышит, как Неумирающий тихо смеется над его словами. Твоя судьба не служить Ему вечно. А уйти без спора, когда Он прошепчет "пора".

languages.text: "Sehnt sich dieser Narr wirklich nach ewigem Dienst? Er hört wohl nicht, wie der Todlose leise über seine Worte lacht. Es ist nicht die Bestimmung dieses Mannes, Ihm ewig zu dienen. Sondern ergeben zu gehen, wenn Er flüstert: 'Es ist Zeit..'"
languages.original_text: "This fool says he yearns for everlasting service? He does not hear the Undying One laughing quietly at his words. It is not this man's destiny to serve Him for eternity. It is to leave meekly when He whispers, 'It is time.'"

traits.locale_text: "Sehnt sich dieser Narr wirklich nach ewigem Dienst? Er hört wohl nicht, wie der Todlose leise über seine Worte lacht. Es ist nicht die Bestimmung dieses Mannes, Ihm ewig zu dienen. Sondern ergeben zu gehen, wenn Er flüstert: 'Es ist Zeit..'"

languages.text: « Cet insensé rêve de servir l'Empereur pour l'éternité ? Il n'entend pas l'Immortel rire de ses paroles. Le destin de cet homme n'est pas de Le servir à jamais. Sa mission est d'accepter de partir de bon cœur quand Il lui susurrera "Le moment est venu". »
languages.original_text: "This fool says he yearns for everlasting service? He does not hear the Undying One laughing quietly at his words. It is not this man's destiny to serve Him for eternity. It is to leave meekly when He whispers, 'It is time.'"

traits.locale_text: « Cet insensé rêve de servir l'Empereur pour l'éternité ? Il n'entend pas l'Immortel rire de ses paroles. Le destin de cet homme n'est pas de Le servir à jamais. Sa mission est d'accepter de partir de bon cœur quand Il lui susurrera "Le moment est venu". »

languages.text: “这个蠢货是说要生生世世侍奉祂吗？不死之神低声窃笑，可他却没有听到。这个人的命运并不是永远侍奉祂，而是当祂轻声呢喃‘大限已至’时，会毫不抗拒地离去。”
languages.original_text: "This fool says he yearns for everlasting service? He does not hear the Undying One laughing quietly at his words. It is not this man's destiny to serve Him for eternity. It is to leave meekly when He whispers, 'It is time.'"

traits.locale_text: “这个蠢货是说要生生世世侍奉祂吗？不死之神低声窃笑，可他却没有听到。这个人的命运并不是永远侍奉祂，而是当祂轻声呢喃‘大限已至’时，会毫不抗拒地离去。”

languages.text: «¿El bufón dice anhelar un servicio eterno? No oye al Inmortal riéndose en silencio de sus palabras. No está en el destino de este hombre servirle eternamente, sino marcharse con obediencia cuando Él susurre "es la hora"».
languages.original_text: "This fool says he yearns for everlasting service? He does not hear the Undying One laughing quietly at his words. It is not this man's destiny to serve Him for eternity. It is to leave meekly when He whispers, 'It is time.'"

traits.locale_text: «¿El bufón dice anhelar un servicio eterno? No oye al Inmortal riéndose en silencio de sus palabras. No está en el destino de este hombre servirle eternamente, sino marcharse con obediencia cuando Él susurre "es la hora"».

languages.text: 「この愚か者は永遠の奉仕を望んでいると言うのですか？彼は、不死の者がその言葉に密かに笑っているのが聞こえていないのです。この者の運命は、永遠に仕えることではありません。『時は来た』と囁かれた時に、従順に去ることです」
languages.original_text: "This fool says he yearns for everlasting service? He does not hear the Undying One laughing quietly at his words. It is not this man's destiny to serve Him for eternity. It is to leave meekly when He whispers, 'It is time.'"

traits.locale_text: 「この愚か者は永遠の奉仕を望んでいると言うのですか？彼は、不死の者がその言葉に密かに笑っているのが聞こえていないのです。この者の運命は、永遠に仕えることではありません。『時は来た』と囁かれた時に、従順に去ることです」

languages.text: "Bu aptal, ebedî hizmet için can attığını mı söylüyor? Ölmeyen'in sözlerine sessizce güldüğünü duymaz tabii. Bu adamın kaderi, O'na sonsuza dek hizmet etmek değil. O, 'Zamanı geldi.' diye fısıldadığında usulca göçüp gitmek."
languages.original_text: "This fool says he yearns for everlasting service? He does not hear the Undying One laughing quietly at his words. It is not this man's destiny to serve Him for eternity. It is to leave meekly when He whispers, 'It is time.'"

traits.locale_text: "Bu aptal, ebedî hizmet için can attığını mı söylüyor? Ölmeyen'in sözlerine sessizce güldüğünü duymaz tabii. Bu adamın kaderi O'na sonsuza dek hizmet etmek değil. O, 'Zamanı geldi.' diye fısıldadığında usulca göçüp gitmek."
